DOC.detailed_description: Recent work laboratory Joslin Diabetes Center elsewhere show small animal exercise improve muscle improve blood sugar level . Also , animal show change abdominal fat tissue , compare animal exercise . Our data suggest factor release exercised muscle fat tissue exercise mouse also positive effect tissue animal . Therefore , could new factor hormone , come trained animal ' muscle fat tissue exert positive effect animal ' blood sugar level . Large study human volunteer show exercise improve blood sugar uptake skeletal muscle lower blood sugar level , thereby prevent type 2 diabetes . The purpose study evaluate single exercise bout lead change circulate factor blood . We plan detect hormone produce body beneficial effect elsewhere body .
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 . Body mass index ( BMI ) must ≥20 ≤26 kg/m2 . HbA1c value ≤5.7 % Age < 18 > 35 ; HbA1c ≥ 5.7 % ; heart lung disease ; acute systemic infection accompany fever , body ache , swollen lymph gland ; BMI ≥ 26 kg/m2 ; current diet weight loss effort ; current pregnancy breastfeeding ; know history HIV/AIDS ; cancer ; biochemical evidence renal hepatic dysfunction ; renal liver disease ; demyelinate disease multiple sclerosis amyotrophic lateral sclerosis ; recent blood donation ; clinical history stroke ; hypertension ( systolic > 140 mmHg diastolic > 90 mmHg ) ; type 1 2 diabetes ; history keloid formation inability exercise 50 % predicted heart rate ( HR ) reserve baseline . Participants take betablockers Participants screen positive The American Heart Association 's contraindication exercise test
